summary: Horus was a very important god in ancient Egypt, associated with kings, the sun, and the sky. He was often shown as a falcon or a man with a falcon head. There are different forms of Horus, each with unique roles. He is known as a protector and healer. Horus was believed to be related to the pharaohs and was the son of Isis and Osiris in one tradition. Another tradition considers him the husband of Hathor. Ancient texts also mention a link between Horus and the Greek god Apollo.
title: Horus
